title: Cant post to other boards
body: I'm lvl 30 but it says im too low level to post on gameplay.

replies.body: Sometimes an account has to sync with the boards, so you may not have shown at 30 right away.  Everything looks okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IxtrkIbU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-06T19:49:06.913+0000)
>
> Sometimes an account has to sync with the boards, so you may not have shown at 30 right away.  Everything looks okay now!

Yes it's all fixed now thank you.

A lot of the time your account doesn't sync up properly to the boards when you first start using them. Making a post in a non-restricted section of the boards, such as here, should help sync them up. This seems to have worked for you, as I do see you as level 30.
